data.title: Darlington Borough Council
data.meta_description:
Darlington Council's Business team is here to help you. We can provide advice on
business planning, grants and loans, finding new premises, staff recruitment,
apprenticeships and training. We can also signpost you to other support agencies
and be your first point of contact on enquiries relating to planning issues,
highways and environmental services. Four key words to summarise what service we
can provide to businesses; Invest, Start, Grow and Develop.
data.text:
Follow us via

Sector: Public Administration

Darlington Council's Business team is here to help you. We can provide advice on business planning, grants and loans, finding new premises, staff recruitment, apprenticeships and training. We can also signpost you to other support agencies and be your first point of contact on enquiries relating to planning issues, highways and environmental services. Four key words to summarise what service we can provide to businesses; Invest, Start, Grow and Develop.
